## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature or enhancement you'd like to see in Luno.

## Problem It Solves

What problem does this feature solve? How will it improve the user experience?

## Proposed Solution

How do you imagine this feature working? Describe the ideal behavior, UI, or workflow.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions? If so, explain them here.

## Additional Context

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here. Examples:
- Link to similar features in other products
- Mockups or sketches
- Edge cases to consider

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Nice to have
- [ ] Important
- [ ] Critical

## Potential Impact

Who will benefit from this feature?
- [ ] General users
- [ ] Power users
- [ ] Developers
- [ ] Other (describe below)

## Resources

If you have any reference links, code samples, or documentation that might help, share them here.
